description:
Nearly three decades have passed since we last saw Jennifer Love Hewitt and Freddie Prinze Jr. as their characters from I Know What You Did Last Summer and its sequel, I Still Know What You Did Last Summer. Now a new I Know What You Did Last Summer movie is on the way, with several [...]

title: ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’ First Look: Jennifer Love Hewitt & Freddy Prinze Jr. Return

description:
The Predator film franchise is preparing a return to theaters later this year with Predator: Badlands. Ahead of that film’s release, however, fans will be getting an additional treat with the animated movie Predator: Killer of Killers. As you can see below, the new trailer for Predator: Killer of Killers reveals a release date for [...]

title: ‘Predator: Killer Of Killers’ Trailer Reveals Animated ‘Predator’ Movie

description:
As with any network or television platform, CBS is consistently curating its content for any number of reasons. This doesn’t make it any less disappointing for viewers, however, when they discover their favorite shows have been canceled. Now CBS has canceled two series from their network lineup – both of which are from the same [...]

title: CBS Cancels Two Fan-Favorite Series
